item.title: Mega Man Returns In 2027 With A Brand-New Entry For Switch And Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
Here's a first look at the gameplay

At The Game Awards, Capcom announced Mega Man: Dual Override for the Switch and Switch 2. It will be releasing in 2027.

Along with this was a first look at the gameplay, and it appears to feature the same classic-style action fans know and love. Here's an official description to go with it:

"Mega Man returns in 2027 with a brand-new entry in the classic action platforming series! Override challenges and blast down legions of robots while springboarding across a new array of futuristic frontiers!"

During today's show, Capcom also announced the sci-fi title Pragmata would be coming to the Switch 2 early next year. There'll also be an amiibo and a demo released.

Excited about this news? Let us know in the comments.

Liam is a news writer and reviewer across Hookshot Media. He's been writing about games for more than 15 years and is a lifelong fan of many iconic video game characters.
